Html
<div class="row">
  <div class="col-m-6">m6</div>
  <div class="col-m-6">m6</div>
</div>  

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-m-*">...</div>
  <div class="col-m-*">...</div>
</div>
Css
.row {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  margin: 0 clac((-1) * (col-padding-value));
}  

.col-m-* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 0 (col-padding-value);
  flex: 0 0 ( * / 12);
}
